pages.text:
&n&6&lDimension:&r&r    &n&lThe End&r
&n&6&lArea Level:&r&r    &n50 - 65 &r&r
&n&6&lEnraged Area Level:&r &n70 - 90&r
&n&6&lExceptions:&r  &nNone&r
&n&6&lQuests covered:&r  &nAct V;&r
&n&6&lDimension gateways:&r  &nAct V Gateway;
&n&6&lDimension Bosses:&r &nEnder Dragon; Void Worm; Shelterer  &r

Dimension that looks like The End of everything there is. Just a fractured plane of floating islands in complete nothingness.$(br) The main island seems to be guarded by the Ender Dragon preventing easy escape. Killing the dragon opens 2 paths: a portal home and a portal deeper into the void to explore further islands.

pages.title: Getting into The End
pages.text: If you are looking to get to this dimension, you need to lay your hands on&n&l total of 12 Ender Eyes inserted into portal frame found in a Stronghold.&r$(2br)Sometimes you can find a portal with few eyes inserted into sockets from previous attempts to reach it.

pages.name: End Portal
pages.text: This portal cannot be built in survival, you can only find one and insert eyes in the sockets to activate
